heading: HB00991
0: AN ACT PROVIDING ADDITIONAL ORGANIZATIONAL AND OPERATIONAL FUNDING TO THE NATIONAL YOUTH COMMISSION (NYC), TO SUSTAIN ALL DEVELOPMENTAL PROGRAMS, TO FOSTER A COMPREHENSIVE NATION-BUILDING STRUCTURE, TO ACCELERATE AND ESTABLISH A PROGRESSIVE SCHEME TOWARDS MATURITY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00991
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING ADDITIONAL ORGANIZATIONAL AND OPERATIONAL FUNDING TO THE NATIONAL YOUTH COMMISSION (NYC), TO SUSTAIN ALL DEVELOPMENTAL PROGRAMS, TO FOSTER A COMPREHENSIVE NATION-BUILDING STRUCTURE, TO ACCELERATE AND ESTABLISH A PROGRESSIVE SCHEME TOWARDS MATURITY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
